column1: kaisooficrec 160943749743 "2017-05-22 10:52:27 GMT" http://kaisooficrec.tumblr.com/post/160943749743/introduction "findabeta: Many things fall under the category of “struggle”
column2: but none so much as the desperate search for a beta reader. When you are just starting out as a fic writer
column3: it can be extremely overwhelming to find someone who would even be willing to read over your work once before you post it. Or perhaps you’ve been in the community for awhile as primarily a reader and want to try your hand at writing
column4: but you’re hesitant to approach people. Whatever the situation
column5: if you’re looking for a beta reader (or if you’re a reader looking to beta)
column6: this blog is for you. This is going to be a place where writers and betas can find each other and
column8: develop great partnerships. A beta can be anything from a proof-reader
column9: to someone that helps you plan things out
column10: to a personal cheerleader. Whatever you’re looking for
column11: we’re hoping to help you find. The process in which this blog will be run is that writers and betas will fill out a form and those forms will be shared here under specific tags. Visitors to the site that are looking for a beta or writer will be able to find your forms through the tags and should be able to find someone they click with. As this is a brand new blog and one of the first of its kind for the kpop community
column12: we really hope you’ll spread the news about us so that more betas and writers will send in forms or contact the ones who’ve already been posted. We really just want to help everyone find what they’re looking for. Now
column14: here are the forms!Writers looking for Betas /// Betas looking for Writers         ub�dx  everyone who’s looking for a beta/writer don’t hesitate and join the list!" False text

The KFR team are happy to announce that we are recruiting new admins~ The current admins have been talking about this and it is agreed that we are all excited to work with new people in order to consistently rec new fics for the fandom. We love KD very much and are always willing to help everyone but lately
column4: and other priorities have caught up to us and keeping the balance between KFR and life has proved to be difficult TT-TT If you are interested in becoming part of our team
column5: here’s all you need to do!Requirements:A nice and easygoing personality/attitudeOpen mindedness and patienceA good grasp on grammar and high standards for fics. The grammar and quality of the fic are important!Be dedicated and willing to help!!Tumblr savvy (at least know the basics)Must be an active member (be able to update the blog at least 2-3 times in a week
column6: ideally more! Please bear in mind this is a decent time commitment) Application Form (Copy and paste into Submission):Name (or Nickname) and Age:Time Zone:Tumblr (+ Twitter is optional): Tumblr Activity on a scale of 1-10 (least-most). Please be honest. We’re looking for new ACTIVE admins!:How often do you read fics? How big is your knowledge of kd fanfics?:Top 3 favourite kd fics and why:What is/are your favourite genre?:Favourite kinks:Kinks/Warnings you absolutely can’t read / don’t like:Why should you be an admin?:  Tell us something fun about yourself!!  Suggestions/ideas to revamp blog (optional!!!)DEADLINE Thursday 29th  Friday 23rd June 2017 6am KST" True text
